item.description:
What do you get when you mix drinking, caroling and dancing? Well, do your vocal exercises, put on your dancing shoes and come find out this Friday night!

Join Emily and Stephanie as they visit some of Providence's fine establishments.

We're not sure where the group will end up at the end of the night, but here is what we know for sure:
8:00pm - 9:30ish
Wild Colonial
250 South Water St.
Providence, RI 02903
(401) 621-5644

9:30ish - 11:00ish
Red Fez
49 Peck St.
Providence, RI 02903
(401) 272-1212

The rest of the evening may include: Blakes, Local 121, Club 201, Tazza, etc.

P.S. This is not a Doc LateNite production, but I hear the jingle of his reindeer in the distance, so he may be making an appearance.

P.P.S. Please be sure to make arrangements for a safe ride home!
item.how_to_find_us: Emily and Stephanie usually aren't too difficult to spot.
item.name: Friday Night with Em & Steph
